name: barefoot-nomad
description: Making company travel and accomodation easy and convinient

scripts.test: cross-env npm run migration:refresh:test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run db:seed && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --timeout 20000 -r @babel/register ./src/test/**/*.test.js --exit
scripts.migration:refresh: npm run migration:rollback && npm run migration
scripts.migration:refresh:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run migration:rollback && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run migration
scripts.migration:refresh:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run migration:rollback && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run migration
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run migration:refresh:prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run db:seed && npm run build
